column1: '''The Breaking Of The Fellowship''' is the seventeenth track of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring - Original Motion Picture Soundtrack]]'' by [[Howard Shore]]. It was composed by Edward Ross.
When the cold of winter comes
In the veiling of the sun
We will walk in bitter rain
When the seas and mountains fall
In the dark I hear a call
